title: The Founder of the Great Financial Family - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Assassins   Calm Protagonist   Clan Building   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Dragons   Dwarfs   Economics   Elves   European Ambience   Family   Fantasy World   Goblins   Late Romance   Magic   Male Protagonist   Management   Mature Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Money Grubber   Monsters   Orcs   Orphans   Poor to Rich   Priests   Proactive Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   Siblings   Sibling's Care   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transmigration   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters   Wizards   Younger Brothers   Younger Sisters
author: De Mun Ho   대문호
description:
I somehow ended up in the world of a novel with magic and dragons.

Why? I have no idea.

I just woke up here.

I’ve read a lot of web novels and normally you would have ended up in the body of the protagonist with outstanding talent or the tr*sh child of some rich and famous family.

My situation should have been like that too…

‘Isn’t this.. a little too unfair?’

…..

Given my background, there was only one way to move forwards and live.

‘Yeah. At the end of the day, money is the best. No matter which world, it’s always driven by money,’>
